displaytitle: Mt. Desert Island in the Distance seen from the Main Land
creditline: Gift of Frank Jewett Mather Jr.
inscribed:
in graphite, upper right of left sheet: Mt. Desert Island in the distance seen from the Main Land | Newport Mt. | Big Day Mt. | Buck Hill 
in graphite, throughout: [notations]

titles.title: Mt. Desert Island in the Distance seen from the Main Land
Mt. Desert Island in the distance seen from the Main Land / Newport Mt. / Big Day Mt. / Buck Hill.  Details of rocks lower right

makers.displaydate: 1801–1848; born Lancashire, England; died Catskill, NY

texts.textentryhtml: Bought from Mrs. Florence Cole Vincent, Cole's granddaughter at his Catskill studio
